title: Ranger of Ithilien (4C130)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Companion • Man
Strength:	6
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Game Text:	Ring-bound. Ranger. When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. While skirmishing a roaming minion, this companion is strength +2.
Lore:	”…they were goodly men, pale-skinned, dark of hair, with grey eyes and faces sad and proud.”
Rarity:	C
